PHRASE.LANG: Bud the miniature horse enjoys standing around in PlayStation Home, he's just not a fan of carrying people around. [#Legal]
Bud, le cheval miniature, aime se balader dans PlayStation®Home, mais il n'aime pas trop porter des gens sur son dos. [#Legal]
Das Minipferd Bud steht gerne in PlayStation®Home herum, trägt aber nicht gerne Leute. [#Legal]
A Bud, il cavallo in miniatura, piace gironzolare per PlayStation®Home, è solo che non gli piace portare in giro la gente. [#Legal]
A Bud, el caballo miniatura, le gusta pasearse por PlayStation®Home, pero no es muy aficionado a llevar personas. [#Legal]
Bud the miniature horse enjoys standing around in PS Home, he's just not a fan of carrying people around. [#Legal]
